siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Not having hit $1000 for Fritsche yet (Fix this. Yes - you. convenient link to donation page). Netflix cancelled their Marvel shows, especially Daredevil. Four star reviews on a five star scale. Miracle whip. BLTs with copious amounts of mayonnaise. BLTs with undercooked baconâ€¦
